*[[agape|True love]] – love without condition, motive or attachment. Loving someone just because they are themselves, not their actions or beliefs in particular. Also reffered to as unconditional love.

*[[Instantaneous Love]] - Love that occours the instant that one person comes in contact with another and feels a deep conection or attraction to the other. Also known as "love at first sight" and reffered to commonly in many fairy tales and folk lore.
